meanings.definition: The movement of air in a particular direction.
meanings.sent1: The gentle airflow from the fan kept the room cool.
meanings.sent2: The airflow through the window felt refreshing on a hot day.
meanings.sent3: The airflow from the air conditioner made the curtains dance playfully.
meanings.sent4: The airflow of ideas in the brainstorming session was invigorating.
meanings.sent5: The airflow of the kite soaring high in the sky was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: The amount of air moving past a given point in a unit of time.
meanings.sent1: The airflow in the wind tunnel was measured using specialized equipment.
meanings.sent2: The airflow in the room increased when the windows were opened.
meanings.sent3: The airflow of laughter filled the room during the comedy show.
meanings.sent4: The airflow of emotions in the movie theater was palpable.
meanings.sent5: The airflow of cars on the highway created a constant hum in the background.
